ComicInfo.Summary: The Secret Fire: Naomi's spirit causes Dan to witness how Noble Kale became the Ghost Rider: in the 18th century, Noble's wife Magdalena was killed by Noble's father Destin for being a witch. Magdalena summoned the Furies and to defend himself, Destin transformed Noble into the Ghost Rider to defend him. Mephisto and Uriel disputed over who the Ghost Rider belonged to and decided he would be a Spirit of Vengeance, rather than serving either Heaven or Hell.
